name: AI Raider
description:
You are a government trained agent who has a chip in his brain to communicate with an AI companion. A new mission was given to you two that involves going to a church that is accused of suspicious activities.

This is a Doom Classic inspired shooter game which is made by one programmer and one voice actor. List of assets :

https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kaykit-dungeon

https://jaks.itch.io/lowpolyforestpack

https://xiszyy.itch.io/asset-forge-log-cabin-pack

https://www.cgtrader.com/items/72627/download-page

https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/tiny-texture-pack

Music : 

Controls :

-W, A, S, D to move around

-Use mouse to look around

-Mouse left button to shoot around

-R to reload
